summary: This bill, the "Consolidating Aerospace Programs Efficiently at Canaveral Act" (CAPE Canaveral Act), mandates the relocation of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) headquarters to Brevard County, Florida, within one year of the bill's enactment. It was introduced in the Senate on March 13, 2025, by Mrs. Moody and Mr. Scott of Florida and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
